entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 33
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 3 Photos from the special event 1983-0107 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 3 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 26 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: <a href="https://eternalmoments.smugmug.com/Countries/India/1984""> India 1984</a>.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
